Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express & #J14 Jeffery Jump Temporary Reroute at  Lake Shore Drive/38th
ShortDescription: Southbound #6 Jackson Park Express & #J14 Jeffery Jump buses are temporarily rerouted via Lake Shore Drive, 39th, Cottage Grove, 47th & Lake Shore Drive.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #6 Jackson Park Express & #J14 Jeffery Jump buses are temporarily rerouted via Lake Shore Drive, 39th, Cottage Grove, 47th & Lake Shore Drive, then resume their normal route, due to police activity near Lake Shore Drive/38th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #76 Diversey Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Diversey/Clark
ShortDescription: Eastbound #76 Diversey buses are temporarily rerouted via Diversey, Clark, Fullerton and Cannon Drive, due to street blockage near Diversey/Clark.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #76 Diversey buses are temporarily rerouted via Diversey, Clark, Fullerton and Cannon Drive, then resume their normal route, due to, street blockage near Diversey/Clark.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #29 State Temporary Northbound Reroute near State/67th
ShortDescription: Northbound #29 State buses are temp rerouted via State, 67th, Wentworth, 63rd and State then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near State/67th.
